results.description: Wales are happy to have a regular home venue at Rodney Parade for their Euro 2021 qualifiers, according to manager Jayne Ludlow.
results.shortTitle: Wales relish Rodney Parade home games
results.title: Wales relish Rodney Parade home games, says boss Jayne Ludlow

results.description: Scotland begin their Euro 2021 qualifying campaign in style as they cruise past Cyprus at Easter Road, with Kim Little netting five.
results.shortTitle: Little nets five as Scots hammer Cyprus
results.title: Scotland women 8-0 Cyprus women: Shelley Kerr's side begin Euro 2021 qualifying with win

results.description: What can Scotland Women take from their first World Cup - and painful exit - as qualification for the next major tournament begins?
results.shortTitle: Key questions for Kerr & Scotland Women
results.title: Scotland v Cyprus: The key questions for Shelley Kerr & her team after World Cup

results.description: Watch on BBC ALBA, listen on BBC Radio Scotland, and follow live text commentary as Scotland open their European Championship qualification campaign at home to Cyprus.
results.shortTitle: Five goals for Little as Scotland Women hit eight past Cyprus
results.title: Women's European Championship qualifying: Scotland 8-0 Cyprus

thumbnail.altText: Claire Emslie celebrates opening the scoring

results.description: Chelsea's Erin Cuthbert and fellow forward Fiona Brown of Rosengard drop out of the Scotland squad to face Cyprus in their opening Women's Euro 2021 qualifier.
results.shortTitle: Cuthbert and Brown blow for Scotland Women
results.title: Scotland Women: Erin Cuthbert and Fiona Brown miss Euro opener with Cyprus

thumbnail.altText: Scotland's Erin Cuthbert and Fiona Brown

results.description: The BBC secures exclusive rights to the 2021 Women's European Championship, which will be hosted by England.
results.title: Women's Euro 2021: BBC secures exclusive European Championship rights

thumbnail.altText: England captain Steph Houghton and Scotland's Erin Cuthbert in action during the 2019 Women's World Cup in France

results.description: Former head coach Anna Signeul still feels part of Scotland's World Cup journey but will miss the tournament in France with the Finnish national side in action.
results.title: Women's World Cup: Signeul with Scots in spirit

thumbnail.altText: Former Scotland head coach Anna Signeul

results.description: Scotland are drawn in the same group as former coach Anna Signeul's Finland in the Women's European Championship qualifiers, while Northern Ireland are in the same group as Wales.
results.title: Women's Euro 2021 qualifiers: Scotland face former coach Anna Signeul's Finland

results.description: England will host the 2021 Women's European Championship, Uefa confirms, with the final to be held at Wembley.
results.title: Women's Euro 2021: England named hosts of European Championship

results.description: Scotland centre-forward Jane Ross joins a girls' football training session at Port Glasgow as part of a scheme to encourage more girls to play the game.
results.title: Scotland striker Jane Ross inspires Glasgow girls

results.description: Scotland and Manchester City's Claire Emslie "wants to win everything" as she targets the 2019 World Cup and Champions League.
results.title: Claire Emslie: Scotland winger targets World Cup after missing Euro 2017

results.description: The Netherlands win their first major women's international tournament after a thrilling 4-2 victory over Denmark in the Euro 2017 final on home soil.
results.title: Women's Euro 2017 final highlights: Netherlands 4-2 Denmark

results.description: The Netherlands win their first major women's international tournament with a thrilling victory over Denmark in the Euro 2017 final.
results.title: Netherlands Women 4-2 Denmark Women

results.description: After reaching the semi-finals but having failed in their bid for European glory, how did the England Women squad rate?
results.shortTitle: How did Sampson and his players rate at Euro 2017?
results.title: England Women: How did Mark Sampson and his players rate at Euro 2017?

results.description: The Dutch make history - the host nation defeat Denmark 4-2 to win Euro 2017 in front of a sell-out crowd in Enschede.
results.title: Women's Euro 2017 final: FT: Netherlands 4-2 Denmark

results.description: England women head coach Mark Sampson says he needs "time to reflect" on his future following the Lionesses semi-final defeat at Euro 2017.
results.shortTitle: Sampson needs 'time to reflect on loss'
results.title: England women: 'We've come up short and I need time to reflect' says Mark Sampson

results.description: As England are knocked out of the Women's Euros, fans give Newsbeat their message to the players.
results.title: Euro 2017: Our message to the Lionesses

results.description: England's Women's Euro 2017 campaign comes to a disappointing end as they are beaten 3-0 in the semi-finals by hosts the Netherlands.
results.shortTitle: Highlights: Dutch end England Euro dream
results.title: Women's Euro 2017 highlights: Netherlands 3-0 England

results.description: England women coach Mark Sampson says his players "shed a lot of tears" after their 3-0 semi-final loss to the Netherlands at Euro 2017.
results.title: England women 'devastated' after Netherlands defeat - Mark Sampson

results.description: England lose in the semi-finals of a second straight major tournament as Euro 2017 hosts the Netherlands win 3-0.
results.shortTitle: Dutch knock England out of Euro 2017
results.title: Women's Euro 2017: England knocked out in semi-finals by Netherlands
